familyMemberEthics.description: Ivanka Trump received $100,001 - $1,000,000 in Rent or Royalties income from RIVER EDGE APARTMENTS (Residential Real Estate in Ewing, NJ) the year before her appointment as her father's presidential adviser.
familyMemberEthics.business: River Edge Apartments (Residential Real Estate In Ewing, NJ)

familyMemberEthics.description: Jared Kushner received $100,001 - $1,000,000 in Rent or Royalties income from RIVER EDGE APARTMENTS (Residential Real Estate in Ewing, NJ) the year before his appointment as Pres. Trump's senior adviser.
